metadata.title: CVE-2021-26719 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A directory traversal issue was discovered in Gradlegradle-enterprise-test-distribution-agent before 1.3.2,test-distribution-gradle-plugin before 1.3.2, andgradle-enterprise-maven-extension before 1.8.2. A malicious actor (withcertain credentials) can perform a registration step such that crafted TARarchives lead to extraction of files into arbitrary filesystem locations.

criterions.comment: gradle package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
